apps.title: Music Star - Life Simulator
apps.description:
===================
RECENT 5-STAR REVIEWS
===================
"I’ve played just about every mobile music simulator game and this is probably the best one I’ve come across."
"Rare find: fun game, ZERO ads
"BEEN DREAMING FOR A GAME LIKE THIS."
"Easily the greatest music simulator app around."
"...very in-depth compared to other music simulation games I’ve played."
"Best music sim hands down."
"This is most definitely one of the best life simulators I played."
"One of the best mobile game I’ve ever played. NO ADS!"
"This game is truly one of the best, others feel so rushed and doesn’t make sense but in this game there’s so much to do."
===================

Less than 1% of musicians make it on the path to super stardom! Start at the bottom of the music world and climb the ladder of fame as you create chart topping hits, negotiate record deals, sign artists to your own label and create a musical legacy!

CREATE CHART TOPPING HITS
Create songs in 50+ international genres, level up your musical talent, release viral albums and feature the most popular artists! Create artists, sign them, feature on their songs and see if you can land on the Billboard!

GO VIRAL + BE SOCIAL
Grow your monthly listeners, create concept music videos or release official lyric videos. Gain followers, listeners, subscribers and earn royalties on streams, music video views and become the most popular artist in the world!

WIN AWARDS
Will your songs be nominated and win awards? Become the biggest award winning artist in the world!

LAUNCH YOUR OWN LABEL
Start your own record label, sign new talent, hire the right team, review song lists and drop artists that aren't performing!

MANAGE YOUR MERCHANDISE
Build out your online presence, choose products, determine track lists, limited edition runs, pricing and manage inventory!

BECOME AN INVESTOR
Pivot your career to venture capital and invest in some of the hottest startups for massive returns or buy some of the world's most expensive properties!

BUILD A DYNASTY
Get matched, start dating, choose a ring and get married, raise your kids and take over their lives to continue your legacy!

COMPETE GLOBALLY
With a variety of leaderboards, you'll never stop competing! Can you make it into the Top 100 Artists?

apps.title: Mureka - AI Music Generator
apps.description:
Mureka is the ultimate AI music generator, empowering you to effortlessly craft studio-quality tracks with consistent, professional vocals. Own 100% of your original creations and copyrights. Intuitive, user-friendly design makes music creation easy for everyone.

Easy & Intuitive
No musical background required—create lyrics and melodies with a few clicks. Everyone can be a musician!

Fully Customizable Preferences
From style and mood to instrument choices, fine-tune every detail to match your taste and craft music that’s truly yours.

== Exclusive Features ==

Choose Your Lead Vocal Tone
Pick from pre-built AI vocalists or clone any voice—set gender, texture, and character to design your signature sound.

AI Style-Matching Generation
Upload a favorite track and Mureka AI will instantly generate a new piece that mirrors its style and vibe.

== Who Is Mureka For? ==

Music Enthusiasts: From beginners to pros, anyone can produce studio-level songs.

Content Creators: Videos, podcasts, ads—get custom music fast and leave copyright worries behind.

Songwriters & Producers: Spark inspiration for your next hit or rapidly produce high-quality demos.

Start your music creation journey with Mureka today—your personal AI composition partner, unlocking limitless creative possibilities!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
1. New Feature – Bible to Song: Transform any Bible chapter into music, supporting hymns and worship.
2. Minor improvements and bug fixes.

apps.title: FreeYourMusic
apps.description:
Transfer playlists. Move your music. Free your music library.

Free Your Music is the fastest and easiest way to transfer playlists and perform music transfers across all major streaming platforms. Whether you’re switching from Spotify to Apple Music, Apple Music to Spotify, or syncing songs across TIDAL, Amazon Music, YouTube Music, and SoundCloud—we make your move seamless.

Built your playlists over months or years? Don’t start over. With Free Your Music, you can transfer music, import playlists, and convert music libraries in seconds—no copy-paste, no manual setup, no lost songs.

◉ What you can do with Free Your Music:
• Transfer Spotify to Apple Music
• Transfer Apple Music to Spotify
• Transfer playlists from YouTube Music to TIDAL
• Convert music libraries from Amazon Music to Spotify
• Import playlists from SoundCloud to Apple Music
• Move playlists from Spotify to YouTube Music, TIDAL, Amazon Music, and more
• Transfer music across any major streaming platform
• Sync playlists across multiple services
• Export and back up your music library to keep it safe

◉ Supported Services for Playlist Transfer:
• Spotify
• Apple Music
• YouTube Music
• Amazon Music
• TIDAL
• SoundCloud
• Deezer
• Napster
• More coming soon

◉ Why choose Free Your Music for music transfer?
• Free playlist transfer for up to 600 songs
• Blazing fast and accurate music transfer
• Convert playlists with one tap—no technical skills needed
• Works with Spotify, Apple Music, TIDAL, YouTube, SoundCloud, and more
• Clean, minimalist interface focused on speed
• Reliable alternative to TuneMyMusic, Soundiiz, and SongShift
• Move entire music libraries in just a few clicks
• Keep your personal music experience when switching services

◉ Ditch TuneMyMusic, Soundiiz & SongShift
Tired of unreliable transfers or hidden fees? Free Your Music is a powerful alternative to TuneMyMusic, Soundiiz, and SongShift—without the complications.

• Easier to use than Soundiiz
• Faster than SongShift
• More flexible than TuneMyMusic
• 100% free playlist transfer for up to 600 songs
• Trusted by millions of users worldwide

Use Free Your Music to transfer Spotify to Apple Music, convert Apple Music playlists to Spotify, and transfer music across all your favorite services—quickly and reliably.

◉ Use Free Your Music to:
• Transfer playlists from Spotify to Apple Music
• Transfer Apple Music playlists to Spotify
• Convert playlists between SoundCloud, TIDAL, Amazon, YouTube, and more
• Sync music libraries across all your platforms
• Back up your playlists in one tap
• Migrate your entire music collection to a new service
• Replace TuneMyMusic, Soundiiz, and SongShift with one app

◉ Start Free. Upgrade Anytime.
Transfer your first 600 songs completely free. Upgrade to unlock unlimited music transfer, ongoing playlist syncing, and advanced features. Whether you're a casual listener or music superfan, Free Your Music adapts to your needs.

Download Free Your Music today and start your playlist transfer in seconds. Your music belongs to you—keep it wherever you go.

TOS
http://freeyourmusic.com/terms-of-service

raw_data.releaseNotes:
● Various app improvements

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if you have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

apps.title: POPTube: Music & Video Podcast
apps.description:
POPTube - Pure Tuber Vanced Premium is an ad free music player online app that helps you watch music videos with high-quality (up to 8K), and pop-up videos while playing games.

The reason why POPTube is a must-have stream music free no ads app on your phone.

TRENDING MUSIC MADE FOR YOU:

- Miniature playlist offers various genres and trending music worldwide in real-time updates.
- Listen to all kinds of topics, namely podcasts, news,  football live,... with the audio player feature.
- This feature offers you millions of songs customized based on your taste of music, countries, and Global top songs.

BLOCK ADS FOR VIDEOS:

- Automatic ad blockers that prevent boring ads from distracting your video tube.
- Music streaming apps free Allows users to enjoy all kinds of music, such as POP, R&B, lofi, EDM,... in hours without ads.
- Auto skip ads, including video ads, and pop-up ads.
- Floating video player can block all ads free on Tube.
- Block all ads while listening to music, podcasts, and talkshows.

IMMERSIVE WATCHING EXPERIENCE:

- Listen to music with the screen off and not interrupted by ads
- Listen to great music, favorite podcast shows whenever without being disturbed
- Change music video to built-in audio player, in which, you can lock the video and play with saving mode.
- Add favorite videos to your wish-lists and manage your watching history in ‘My Library’
- Upgrade viewing time with ambient mode, especially with 4K videos. The subtle effect will glow up your videos.
- Adjust speed of the videos in-real time, and find exact screen you want to watch, which you might not miss out any interesting contents.

FLOATING VIDEO PLAYER:

- Allows you to play videos with "On Top '' mode. Now, you can play games, watch movies, and do other tasks.
- You can resize the video player tube floating, and move it to the corner of your phone as you wish.
- Float tube video player app allows you to play videos in the background (Picture-in-Picture) when you exit POPTube, in which you can listen to music, surf the web, and play games,... at the same time.

WATCH VIDEOS WITH HIGH-QUALITY:

- Sit and scroll to watch millions of trending short videos right in your phone.
- Play millions of trending videos with up to 8K resolution. You can also adjust the speed of videos.
- Music player pop up allows you to bookmark and add your favorite videos to your own playlists.

NEW ERA OF AI WATCHING EXPERIENCE:

- Experience the power of AI-generated summaries that capture the essence of any video in seconds.
- Unlock your curiosity of every video you have watched with AI chatbot. Just send a questions, the AI assistant will answer all things related to the video content.

Note: No need to install other plug-ins, such as microG, Manager to play music video and audio.

Disclaimer:

POPTube - floating pop up music player is a third-party tube API and not a downloader app. You are not allowed to use your MP3 music player. All content is from API services. Thus, POPTube cannot directly control the contents. "Please use this link to report any contents that might infringe copyright: https://www.youtube.com/yt/copyright/"

- According to Youtube's Terms of Use, we are not allowed to display Youtube videos on the lock screen, nor to let you download music videos from Youtube.
- You can play unlimited online music, albeit not downloading. You need to connect to the Internet (wifi or cellular data) to use free music streaming apps for IOS.

*******************

Privacy & Policy: https://poptube.app/privacy_policy.html
Terms & Conditions: https://poptube.app/terms_of_service.html
EULA: https://poptube.app/eula.html

*******************

CONNECT WITH LOVE:

POPTube team would love to hear from you!

Got feedback or need help? feedback@tapi.group
Visit: https://poptube.app
Like: https://www.facebook.com/poptube.app
Double tap: https://www.instagram.com/poptube.app

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’ve been working hard to make POPTube even better! Here’s what’s new:

- Fix the loading issue on the homepage and the media error preventing online video playback.


- Play videos and music smoothly even when your screen is off or while using other apps.
- Launching and browsing just got quicker. POPTube is now lighter and more responsive.
- We squashed several bugs to make your experience more stable and reliable.



Thank you for using POPTube!


We’re committed to bringing you the smartest, smoothest, and most user-friendly video experience possible.

Have feedback or feature ideas? Let us know!

apps.description:
Raaga.com - Hindi,Tamil and Telugu songs FREE

Unlimited FREE songs! All the latest music. 

The largest archive of Indian music in over 18 languages including Bollywood, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, Bhangra and many more

Listen absolutely free with ads, or get Raaga Premium. 

Try Raaga Premium FREE!!!

Premium Features

• Unlimited Downloads
Offline your favorite music and playlists and listen anywhere – even without internet – on up to five devices.

• No Ads 
Enjoy your music absolutely Ad-FREE!

• High Quality music
Listen at crystal clear 320kbps, streaming or downloading. Enjoy music the way it was meant to be heard.

• Raaga Talk
Raaga's original and exclusive audio shows created and curated exclusively for you. Available in English, Hindi, Tamil and Telugu with more languages soon.

• Apple TV Support
Raaga is also available on Apple TV. Install the Apple TV app and listen to ad-free music in high quality

• AirPlay Support
Listen through your favorite music system at home.

• Connected TVs
Available on more connected TV platforms. For a full list visit https://www.raaga.com/apps

• Chromecast and Sonos (Coming soon)
We will soon add support for more smart speakers. Stay tuned.


Premium Subscription:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account, and will automatically renew each month within 24 hours of your subscription ending. Cancel any time by turning off auto-renewal in your iTunes Account Settings.


Subscription Terms:
The subscription amount will be displayed before you confirm payment and will depend on the subscription duration & your country
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
Cancellation of the current subscription is not allowed during the active subscription period.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

For more information on privacy policy and terms of use, please visit https://www.raaga.com/terms-conditions and https://www.raaga.com/privacy

Support: iphone-support@raaga.com
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/raagacom
Follow us on Twitter: @raagadotcom

apps.title: Radio Paradise
apps.description:
Radio Paradise streams highly curated, eclectic mixes of music -- chosen by real humans -- with unparalleled audio quality (enhanced by a dazzling photo slideshow, tied in thematically with the songs that are playing). You'll hear modern and classic rock, world music, electronica, and even a bit of classical and jazz — with no random computer-generated playlists, needless chatter, or commercials. The mix always includes a carefully-selected assortment of new songs & artists, many of which you won't hear anywhere else. Most selections are in English, but Radio Paradise always keeps an ear open for great music in other languages.

Our specialty is taking a diverse assortment of songs and making them flow together in a way that makes sense harmonically, rhythmically, and lyrically — an art that, to us, is the very essence of radio. If you don't care for what's playing at the moment, you can skip ahead. Our streams are uncontaminated by either algorithms or capitalism.

Radio Paradise is also a community. Each song is accompanied by thoughts and comments about it from your fellow Radio Paradise listeners.

Listening is always free. We are funded by listeners who like what we do, and pay money to help us keep doing it. For over two decades, Radio Paradise has been dedicated to preserving the art of radio DJ-ing and providing a soundtrack you can enjoy all day every day. Thanks for listening!

Internet radio pioneers: First aired in February 2000
4 eclectic music channels, with more coming soon
16,000+ tracks in the active play library
~1,000,000 tracks in the entire RP music library

Free for everyone • No user data collection • No advertisements ever

We are consistently rated as one of the best internet radio stations worldwide in the media and online. 

Discover why people all over the world make Radio Paradise their all-day everyday soundtrack.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Paperless Music
apps.description:
Free 90-day trial!

Add your sheet music, guitar tabs, fake books, and scores, and leave your paper behind. Organize, annotate, practice, and perform with the most powerful yet easy-to-use music viewer and manager.

Whether you’re a student or teacher, whether you play in a band, sing in a choir, or gig on the weekends, and no matter what your style of music is, you can count on the app’s reliability for live performances and go paperless with confidence.

Build Your Library

• Import PDF files from the Files app, a web browser, or from many other apps and sources.
• Scan your music with the camera-based document scanner.
• Import images from the Photos app.

Organize Your Music

• Describe and classify your music in great detail with information like title, composer, artist, genres, tags, instruments, key, duration, time signature, rating, difficulty, tempo, web link, and notes.
• Add scores with multiple movements or books with multiple songs, then organize them into sections.
• Create collections to make groups of music, such as setlists, virtual binders, or books.
• Easily find the music and collections you’re looking for with filters. With a few taps, for example, you can see all music that’s in a major key with a 4/4 or 6/8 time signature, having a tempo between 120 - 135 beats per minute.
• Create smart folders to automatically keep your music and collections organized.

Add Audio Tracks

• Add tracks from the Music app.
• Record your own audio.
• Import audio files.
• Adjust pitch and playback speed.
• Turn pages automatically while audio plays.

Stay In Tune

• Tune your instrument using the device microphone.
• Generate a tone using a variety of instruments and sounds.
• Adjust the A4 frequency.
• Select from 10 temperaments to customize the tuning.

Practice and Perform

• View music in portrait or landscape mode.
• Scroll music horizontally or vertically.
• Turn pages by swiping, moving the slider, using a Bluetooth page turner, tapping the edge of the screen, following a link, making a facial gesture, or playing audio that has automatic page turning enabled. (Facial gestures require a device with a TrueDepth camera.)
• Create links to jump or scroll to another page. Links are great for music with repeats or codas. They also allow music to be automatically scrolled with precise timing.
• Use the pencil and highlighter tools to write on music with your finger or with the Apple Pencil. All Apple Pencil settings are supported.
• Add text with options for size, rotation, color, font, and justification.
• Choose from a wide selection of symbols and shapes to add fingerings, dynamics, accidentals, and more.
• Use the low-latency metronome with options for sound, visuals, accent, and count off.

See More with Second Screen

• Connect two devices and see more of your music.
• When viewing music on the main device, it will extend onto the other device’s screen.

Share and Back Up

• Share your music and collections with other Paperless Music users, with or without your annotations or audio tracks.
• Share music in native format to preserve all information, or share in PDF format for general sharing and printing.
• Create a backup of your library to keep your data extra safe and to easily transfer everything to other devices.

And Much More

• Set the page color of your music.
• Undo changes made to any page while the viewer is open.
• Choose from six library view modes for music and three modes for collections.
• Batch edit genres, tags, and instruments.
• Adjust the text size in the Settings app to boost or shrink the size of text throughout Paperless Music.
• Search using Spotlight. Find and launch right into your music even when the app isn’t running.

Learn more by reading the integrated, searchable user guide, accessible from the app’s home screen and from the website.

Paperless Music has no ads and no subscriptions. There is no sign-in and there are no accounts.

www.paperlessmusic.com

apps.title: Soundtrap: Music Making Studio
apps.description:
Soundtrap is an online, collaborative music and podcast recording studio. Make music with hundreds of software instruments and thousands of high-quality loops, or record podcasts easily. Collaborate remotely with anyone, in real-time, using the chat in the studio. Work on your projects wherever you are on almost any device, everything is stored in the cloud so that you can start a project on your phone and continue on a computer. Soundtrap - your everywhere studio.

Soundtrap Features

• Record music and podcasts together online
• Invite friends to collaborate remotely on your recordings using the chat in the studio
• Create music with thousands of high-quality, professionally recorded loops in a variety of genres
• Record vocals and play the built-in sampled instruments (piano, organ, synths, drums and more)
• Real-time monitoring - apply effects to your voice as you record
• Use a large number of high-quality and professional effects
• Subscribe to edit your vocals with Vocal Tuner
• Save all your recordings in the cloud for easy access from all devices
• Download and share your recordings via email, WhatsApp, Messenger, Facebook, and Soundcloud

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- General bug fixes and improvements
- Filter loops by tags in the new beta experience

apps.description:
Welcome to Music Tiles 2 – Where Everyone Can Become a True Pianist!

Game Rules:
	•	Easy to play, easy to enjoy! Tap the black tiles in sync with the music – don’t miss any, or you’ll lose!

Key Features:
	•	Studio-Quality Sound – Enjoy lossless audio recorded in professional studios.
	•	Realistic Piano Simulation – Experience natural Attack, Decay, Sustain, and Release (ADSR) for an authentic piano sound.
	•	Multiple Instruments – Grand piano, electric piano, harpsichord, guitar, and more!
	•	Diverse Music Genres – Pop, rap, EDM, jazz, a cappella – all in one game!

apps.title: iChill
apps.description:
The iChill music app brings you the full collection of iChill music available, including lots of new titles previously unavailable . 

iChill has been inspired and specially created for the growing wave of individuals and businesses in need of license free music, suitable for background atmosphere to suit most environments.  You can create  bespoke playlists suitable for therapies and holistic practices such as Yoga, Meditation , Spa, Pilates, Massage, Complimentary therapies, Nail bars, Beauty clinics, and also Cafes’s and Restaurants. 

The music has been written and performed by the iChill music factory, a group of writers not registered with any writing or performance agencies, so you will never have to pay to play music again! The app has easy to use recommend playlists to get you started as well as features to make up your own playlists to suit your business and also the ability to play iChlll music offline for when you want to restrict, or have limited Wi-Fi.

apps.title: MusicMint-AI Music&Song Maker
apps.description:
MusicMint: AI Music Generator - Powered by MusicMint AI, easily create high-quality original songs. 

Have you ever wanted to create the perfect song for a loved one's birthday celebration, or had trouble finding a soundtrack for an AD that would capture the essence of your business? 


MusicMint: AI Music Generator makes creating high-quality original songs a breeze. Whether you're a beginner or a professional musician, this AI tool quickly transforms text into unique songs. Just type in the text, select the music style, and click Generate. MusicMint AI makes music creation easy and fun. Give it a try today and turn your text into a song in any style! 

What it does:

● Music AI Song Generator: Take advantage of advanced MusicMint AI technology to turn text and language into music for easy creation of original songs. Instant song Generator, right at your fingertips! 

● Text to Music: Instantly turn lyrics into music. 

● Random lyrics: Generate diverse music with random lyrics to spur creativity without having to input lyrics. 

● Custom options: Customize instruments, mood, theme, structure and length to create the perfect song for you. 

● A variety of music styles: Choose from pop, rock, hip-hop, etc., and adjust the melody and style to your needs. 

● Easy Mode: Just type in the desired "Song Description," click Generate, and in less than 30 seconds, your personalized song is ready! 

● Download and Share: Download songs in MP3 format and listen to them anytime, anywhere or share them with friends. 

● Pop songs: Explore pop songs and various styles such as blues, pop, jazz, EDM, Korean opera, French Dubstep, etc., for inspiration. 

● Create AI-powered music videos synced to your tracks, with dynamic visuals, lyric animations, and customizable templates in one click.


Why MusicMint: AI Music Generator? 

● Powered by MusicMint AI 

● Easy creation of high-quality original songs 

● Multiple music styles and customization options 

● Simple to use, one-click generation 

● Download and share your music 

● Copyright Guarantee: MusicMint AI guarantees original work, avoids legal issues by ensuring that the music created is completely new and doesn't copy any artist or song 


MusicMint is more than just an app; It's a gateway to musical creativity, powered by MusicMint AI. It's changing the way we interact with Music, empowering everyone to reinvent songs with their own unique voice with the limitless possibilities of Music AI. 


You don't need to be able to sing, play an instrument or read music. MusicMint: The AI Music Generator will do all the hard work, tweaking the songs according to your prompts. 


Download MusicMint AI now to begin your journey of AI-generated music! Try MusicMint today to bring your musical ideas to life!

This application requires an active paid subscription.  
You can purchase an automatic renewal subscription through in app purchases.  
Subscription Package: 

Product or Service: MusicMint Membership 

Weekly plan: $4.99/Year plan: $39.99/Year 
• No commitment. Cancel at any time Your subscription will automatically renew until cancelled.  

Service:
• Free lyrics creation
• Multiple music styles
• Experience without ads
• Play high-quality music

After confirming the purchase, a fee will be charged to the iTunes account

• Unless auto renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period, the subscription will automatically renew. The account will renew within 24 hours before the end of the current period and the renewal fee will be determined

• The subscription may be managed by the user, and auto renewal may be turned off after purchase by going to the user account settings. Link to our terms and privacy:

apps.title: RockMyRun - Workout Music
apps.description:
ROCKMYRUN IS THE BEST WORKOUT MUSIC IN THE WORLD!

RockMyRun is music designed FOR running and working out. Our music is expertly selected and curated by professional DJs, not algorithms, to give you the optimal workout music experience. Compared to standard playlists, RockMyRun is proven to increase workout motivation and enjoyment by up to 35%!


LEGALLY LICENSED FOR CONSUMER USE ONLY. BUSINESS LICENSE AVAILABLE. 

If you intend to use RockMyRun at a place of business or are an independent fitness trainer you will need to get RMR with a commercial music license. Please contact brett@rockmygym.com or visit our business website at www.rockmygym.com for more information.


AWESOME FEATURES

► ADJUSTABLE BPM:
One-of-a-kind Body-Driven Music™ technology automatically adjusts music to sync with your steps or heart rate. You can also manually manipulate music to match your ideal BPM (beats per minute).

► DJ-CURATED MUSIC:
Our professional DJ’s curate specialized music to give you the best exercise experience for non-stop energy during your workout. (No more hitting skip!)

► NOT YOUR AVERAGE WORKOUT MUSIC:
RockMyRun is different from Spotify, Apple Music and Pandora Radio because all songs are specially selected and seamlessly blended together, creating a unique workout music experience unavailable in standard music apps. Our real DJs use only the best parts of your favorite songs to create the best music optimized for your run.

► RUN TRACKING:
Track your distance and pace while rocking out to the music you love, all in one app.

► TEMPO THAT BUILDS:
Stations build in BPM during your workout to help keep you going with the perfect exercise music at the perfect moment.

► PERSONALIZED SUGGESTIONS:
Get station suggestions that are constantly updated based on your listening preferences.

► ROBUST DISCOVERY OPTIONS:
Discover new music based on activity, mood, BPM, length, and genre. We’re proud to offer stations for Pop, Rock, Hip-hop, Rap, EDM, House, Dubstep, Drum & Bass, 70’s, 80’s, 90’s, Oldies, Christian, R&B, Latin, Reggae, Seasonal, Country, Alternative, Classical, and more.

► NOT JUST FOR RUNNING:
Use it as a gym playlist for the elliptical or treadmill, during a 10k run, with Couch to 5k, or while engaging in marathon training, crossfit, bootcamp, cycling, and so much more!

► WORKS WITH YOUR FAVORITE APPS:
RockMyRun functions seamlessly with running apps and tracking apps like Apple Health, Strava, Nike+, Runkeeper, MapMyFitness, Runtastic Endomondo, and more. They’ll do the tracking and we'll do the rocking while you’re training.


FEATURED IN

► NEW YORK TIMES:
“Music can be a great help to runners, but sometimes putting together a playlist can be a chore. Leave the running song selection up to RockMyRun.”

► LA TIMES:
“Great variety; it's easy to find something to your tastes. Choose from oldies, dubstep, hip-hop, country and a dozen other genres, then personalize it via preferred beats per minute, clean or explicit lyrics.”

► WALL STREET JOURNAL feature on WNBA MVP Elena Delle Donne:
“Ms. Delle Donne uses the app Rock My Run, which has a feature that matches the beat of songs to your pace.”

► GLAMOUR:
“These Pre-Made Music Mixes Will Change Everything”

► TODAY SHOW Co-Anchor, Natalie Morales:
“I am totally downloading this.”


HOW IT WORKS

Just for registering, you get a free trial and access to all premium content and features. Once the trial ends, you will automatically be upgraded to a premium account where you can sync unlimited running music to your body and listen to 1,000s of hours of music.
Questions? Email support@rockmyrun.com.


SERVICE DETAILS

► Length of subscription: Monthly or Yearly
► Price of subscription: Varies
► Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
► Subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the scheduled renewal.
► The RockMyRun Terms of Service can be found here: https://www.rockmyrun.com/terms.php.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Mubert: AI Music Streaming
apps.description:
MUBERT
 
Listen, Generate and Share AI-powered Music 

How it works 

Download the Mubert app, open it, and the original music stream made just for you is on. Don’t be confused by the simplicity of getting music using the app. Mubert has spent years on R&D of the music generation to create algorithms that make high-quality music streaming so simple and affordable for everyone worldwide.

Each music stream by Mubert is unique

Using an ever-expanding base of samples, Mubert makes sure that each listener could get his original high-quality music stream.
You can also make playlists, adding the streams to favorites, and train the algorithm with your ’likes’ and ’dislikes’ to get the most of personalized music generation. 

Unlimited choice of music 

Depending on your mood, music tastes, and activity, you can choose a stream in techno, chill, house, hip hop, ambient and dozens of other styles plus daily specials and other music ‘easter eggs’ from Mubert.
Put on Mubert and ask your friends, "who's playing?" – bet you'll hear lots of variants, but hardly anyone will say: "algorithms."

Functional music streams for Sports, Focus and Relaxation 

Mubert app is also designed for users who’d like to utilize music as a powerful tool to focus, boost performance doing sports, and vice versa to relax their body and mind for meditation, yoga, or a night of deep restorative sleep. 
At the very moment you are reading this, people are working, studying, running, chilling or happily dozing away listening to music streams by Mubert.

Immersive experiences / Immersive sound and visual experiences 

Mubert app would be impossible without talented musicians, composers, and code developers, who are fusing the newest artistic expression methods with cutting-edge technologies to make high-quality music for all kinds of activities available to anyone.  
But exploring the frontiers of creativity in the modern digital era Mubert Inc also collaborates with bright designers to make even more immersive experiences. 
Check out animated music streams in the Special category of the app. If you have a projector – you can easily create a club-like atmosphere at home.

And one more little thing

All music generated by Mubert’s algorithm can be used to create content for personal use. Suppose you need a short snippet of music to hype your content for a vlog, ad, corporate presentation, posts, and boomerangs on social media. In that case, you can almost instantly generate, save and share a 1-minute track using / even with a free account on the Mubert app. 
No royalties and headaches with music licensing. Just music / With Mubert app, you can freely listen, generate and share music.

Learn Piano the Fun Way!
Join over 14 million music enthusiasts and discover the joy of playing piano with our engaging and interactive app—no experience needed!

Key Features:
Tap & Play – Master songs by tapping tiles 1, 2, 3, 4… 7, 8, 9… to the rhythm
Freestyle Mode – Experiment with real piano notes & chords to create melodies
Diverse Instruments – Grand piano, electric, xylophone & more
Record & Share – Capture your performances and post your music
Level Up – Earn badges, unlock achievements & become a piano star

Play Classic, Pop, Jazz & More!

Extensive Song Library:
Explore a vast collection of songs featuring Mozart, Beethoven, Tchaikovsky, Vivaldi, Bach, Strauss, Verdi, Chopin, Queen of the Night, Für Elise, Ave Maria, Twinkle Twinkle, Bella Ciao, Bad Day, and other favorites!

Two Engaging Modes:
Tap-to-Play – Ideal for beginners to learn by following the beat.
Keyboard Mode – For those ready to play like a real pianist and practice chords

Go Premium – Unlock Your Full Potential!

• Access unlimited songs and instruments​
• Enjoy an ad-free experience​
• Utilize a metronome for precision​
• Full recording and playback access​

apps.title: Magic Cats Rush: Music Games
apps.developer: Beijing Jiayin Network Technology Co., Ltd
apps.description:
Magic Cats Rush is an exhilarating and visually stunning music-based runner game that immerses you in a world where cats rule the rhythm. This exclusive game combines the thrill of endless running with the magic of music, creating an experience that will keep you hooked for hours. Join your feline friends on a high-speed adventure through a variety of vibrant and dynamic environments, all set to the beat of catchy tunes.

Whatever you are looking for super cute cat games，or looking for those addictive music games? The Magic Cats Rush is always the perfect choice for you! This is a unique blend of rhythm game and piano games that captures the hearts of music lovers and cat enthusiasts alike. 

Game Overview
In Magic Cats Rush, you play as a speedy, rhythmic cat who must navigate through a series of obstacle-filled levels. The game's unique twist is its integration of music, where every jump, hop, slide, and dodge must be timed perfectly to the beat. As you dash through each level, you'll encounter various challenges and power-ups that add depth and excitement to the gameplay. You can enjoy super amazing and beautiful cats music——a mix of cute "meowing" sound and pop music. You can experience wonderful feelings beyond your imagination with a perfect blend of beat and music. You can also experience various song styles including both global hit songs and your favorite independent music.

Key Features
- So many hot songs to choose
- Remixes of popular songs with "meowing" sound
- Easy guides to follow
- One-touch control, easy to play
- Bright colors and fantastic design
- Various kawaii cats waiting to collect

How to Play
- Hold and drag the cat to make it jump on the correct tiles
- Be careful not to miss any tiles within one song!
- Complete as many songs as you can!
- Collect as much gold  as you can to unlock new cats
- For a complete musical feeling, headphones are recommended

The game boasts a variety of modes that cater to different player preferences, all under the umbrella of music games free. Whether you're looking for intense rhythm games competition or a relaxing music simulation games experience, "Magic Cats Rush" has something to offer. With piano games with real songs, players can engage with actual tracks from their favorite artists, enhancing the connection between game play and real-world music.

"Magic Cats Rush" also features an extensive offline component, making it one of the few music games offline available today. Players can enjoy piano music offline, ensuring the fun continues even without internet connectivity. This feature is perfect for those who wish to hone their rhythm game skills during commutes or in areas with limited internet access.

Moreover, the game includes cute cat games elements, where each cat character brings its own unique flair and talents to the musical journey. From the deep, resonant purrs of bass notes to the sharp, quick meows of high octaves, the cat music games aspect adds a whimsical twist to conventional rolling tiles gameplay. The integration of cat piano games with traditional song games provides a refreshing take on both genres.

For those captivated by singing songs and dancing along to rhythmic beats, "Magic Cats Rush" offers a comprehensive package of entertainment. It stands out not just as a piano game, but as a celebration of music, rhythm, and feline charm all rolled into one captivating experience.

If you're passionate about music, love cats, or simply enjoy innovative rhythm games, "Magic Cats Rush" is sure to provide endless hours of enjoyment and challenge. Prepare to tap, dance, and purr along with the rhythm of this magical rolling tiles game. Whether you're a seasoned pianist or a casual gamer looking for some musical fun, "Magic Cats Rush" welcomes you to join the ultimate dance party with your furry musical companions.

More surprises waiting for you!Download and enjoy the whole new experience right now!

With piano games with real songs, players can engage with actual tracks from their favorite artists, enhancing the connection between game play and real-world music.

"Magic Cats Rush" also features an extensive offline component, making it one of the few music games offline available today. Players can enjoy piano music offline, ensuring the fun continues even without internet connectivity. This feature is perfect for those who wish to hone their rhythm game skills during commutes or in areas with limited internet access.

Moreover, the game includes cute cat games elements, where each cat character brings its own unique flair and talents to the musical journey. From the deep, resonant purrs of bass notes to the sharp, quick meows of high octaves, the cat music games aspect adds a whimsical twist to conventional rolling tiles gameplay. The integration of cat piano games with traditional song games provides a refreshing take on both genres.

For those captivated by singing songs and dancing along to rhythmic beats, "Magic Cats Rush" offers a comprehensive package of entertainment. It stands out not just as a piano game, but as a celebration of music, rhythm, and feline charm all rolled into one captivating experience.

If you're passionate about music, love cats, or simply enjoy innovative rhythm games, "Magic Cats Rush" is sure to provide endless hours of enjoyment and challenge. Prepare to tap, dance, and purr along with the rhythm of this magical rolling tiles game. Whether you're a seasoned pianist or a casual gamer looking for some musical fun, "Magic Cats Rush" welcomes you to join the ultimate dance party with your furry musical companions.

More surprises waiting for you!Download and enjoy the whole new experience right now!

apps.title: Ensemble — Social Music
apps.description:
Ensemble is the next evolution of social music—built exclusively for musicians, producers, and music lovers. Whether you're a seasoned artist, an up-and-coming producer, or just a fan of great music, Ensemble gives you the tools and community to connect, create, and collaborate like never before.

Create with Ease
At the heart of Ensemble is our intuitive video editor and digital audio workstation (DAW)—designed from the ground up for mobile and fast-paced creativity. You can record, edit, and arrange your musical ideas directly within the app.

Stay in the Flow with AutoFlow
Experience our exclusive AutoFlow technology, which intelligently sequences your videos based on your audio tracks. Whether you're capturing a jam session or assembling a full multi-track production, AutoFlow visualizes your creative process seamlessly—so you can stay inspired without breaking your flow.

Discover & Collaborate
Swipe through a feed full of raw talent, unique sounds, and musical ideas from around the world. Remix your favorite posts, collaborate with other artists, or simply enjoy and support the music you love. Not a musician? No problem—fans play a vital role in shaping the community and discovering the next big sound. Everyone loves a Day 1.

Rise Through the Ranks
Join the monthly Encore challenge and compete to earn a spot on our curated Apple and Spotify playlists, plus real cash rewards. Build your Rhythm Rank, gain exposure, and unlock exclusive perks to boost your musical journey.

A Community Built for Music
We’ve reimagined what a social platform can be for music creators. Ensemble isn’t just another app—it’s a movement. A place where creativity thrives, networking is frictionless, and the music comes first.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’ve been listening, and this update brings some of our biggest releases yet:

New Poster Share options! Spread the word about your competition entries or help grow your ensemble! Help build the community.

Ensembles
Connect with music communities made for artists, fans, and everyone in between. Meet new people, find collaborators, and hang out around the music you love.

Playlists
Arrange your favorite tracks your way. Build mood-based lists, share them with friends, and take control of your soundtrack.

Favorites
Pick your Top 5 songs, show them off, and let others discover what moves you. Support your favorite artists and rep your taste.

Better Chats & DMs
GIF support, silenced group chats, and performance improvements make messaging faster, smoother, and more fun.

Remix Experience
Improved tools, smoother performance, and a more enjoyable remixing experience so you can focus on creativity.

Jam Goals & Rocktober Fest
New challenges, cosmetic rewards, and festival celebrations to push your creativity and unlock exclusive prizes.

Under the Hood
Optimized performance, bug fixes, and UI polish make the app faster and smoother than ever. iPad support.


This update is packed with powerful features and community tools. Explore Ensembles, build playlists, show your favorites, and keep spreading the vibes.

We can’t wait to see what you create next!

apps.title: Musicmania - AI Music Player
apps.description:
Listen to Music, Discover Songs, and Create Your Own Music World!
Musicmania: Unlimited music fun in your pocket with a completely music app!

With Musicmania, discover your favorite songs, artists, albums, and curated playlists through a music player. Thanks to our massive music library and AI-powered recommendation system, find the perfect music for your mood instantly!

Features of Musicmania:

• Stream the latest songs, trending albums, and mood-based playlists with zero interruptions.


• Save your favorite tracks and create custom playlists to enjoy anytime.


• Find any song, artist, or album in seconds with our advanced music search engine.


• Get personalized music and artist suggestions based on your listening habits, powered by AI.


• Enjoy music easily with a simple and user-friendly interface.

Musicmania is completely free. Enjoy full music experience with background play and quick access to your favorite songs.

Whether you're working, commuting, or working out… Musicmania understands your music vibe and plays along with you.

Download Musicmania now and dive into your personalized online music world!

To report copyright issues:
https://forms.gle/7JBb2qtTdVHDTbGv6

apps.title: Tunecho Music-Play Offline
apps.developer: 深圳迪威辛科技有限公司
apps.description:
Powerful music player beyond imagination


Tunecho music is a music player designed specifically for music enthusiasts, allowing you to enjoy your favorite music anytime, anywhere. You can easily manage and play your music library on your device, immersing yourself in the world of music.


Main functions:


Local music import: supports fast loading of local music in your device, and you can listen to your favorite songs without an Internet connection.


Smart classification: intelligently classify your music library according to multiple dimensions such as music albums and artists, allowing you to easily find your favorite songs.


Personalized experience: You can create personalized playlists according to your preferences and collect your favorite music.


Whether you are relaxing at home or traveling on the road, tunecho player will be your best choice to bring you a high-quality music experience.


Download now and start your music journey!

apps.title: MusicBuddy: Vinyl & CD Tracker
apps.description:
MusicBuddy is a powerful music album management app that gives you access to your entire music catalog, anywhere. Using MusicBuddy is fun and easy, allowing you to quickly find any album in your library, share your favorite albums, and keep track of borrowed and lent albums.

FREE VERSION

- MusicBuddy has all the features of MusicBuddy Pro with a 50 album limit. 
- MusicBuddy can be upgraded via In-App Purchase for unlimited album storage.

KEY FEATURES

• Adding Your Albums
Add your albums using the following options:
- Scan barcode (via iPhone camera or Bluetooth handheld scanner)
- Enter UPC/EAN-13
- Search online by keyword
- Add manually
- Import from CSV file

• Organizing Your Albums
Place your albums where they belong:
- My Albums — albums you own
- Wish List — albums you wish to own
- Borrowed — albums you borrowed from others
- Previously Owned — albums you no longer own

• Syncing Your Library
Sync your library across multiple devices using iCloud or Dropbox sync.

MORE TO LOVE

• Universal app — pay once and use MusicBuddy on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple Silicon Mac.
• Personalize — use categories and tags, mark favorites, add personal notes, and much more.
• Appearance — choose either list or grid view to best match your needs.
• Custom Filters — filter your library by multiple criteria.
• Advanced Sorting — apply multi-level data sorting.
• Loans — instantly track albums that are currently loaned out.
• Multiple selection — apply batch operations using multiple selection.
• Quick find — instantly find albums by entering search keywords or scanning their barcodes.
• Export — quickly export your library into CSV, PDF, or HTML formats.
• Print — easily print selected albums to AirPrint-enabled printers.
• Backup — create backups to any cloud service.
• Activity History — view the full history of your loaning activities.
• Duplicates — quickly detect duplicates and easily remove them.
• Markdown Formatting — style your notes with headings, lists, bold, italics, links, and more.
• Privacy — your library is saved locally and privately on your device.
• And so much more!

FEEDBACK

We love staying in touch with our users and we look forward to hearing from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at:

support@kimicoapps.com 
or visit: http://www.kimicoapps.com/support.html

Follow us on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/KimicoLtd

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Minor user interface improvements
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

apps.title: Figure - Make Music & Beats
apps.description:
Figure makes it easy to create great-sounding music in seconds.

Create an addictive beat before the barista brings your coffee or lay down a beefy bass line while waiting for the bus to arrive.

Figure is intuitive enough for beginners to make music within seconds, yet deep enough for you to get lost in endless play on a transatlantic flight.

Simply slide your finger across the play pad to record and tweak catchy drumbeats, memorable melodies and fat bass lines. Just bring your inspiration and Figure will help you take care of the rest.

• App Store Hall of Fame Inductee
• App Store Editor's Choice/App of the Week in many countries

“Exceptionally simple to use, and you'll be making music in seconds.” – Music Radar

“Exceedingly fun and easy to use… a deeply involved music-making experience.” – The Verge

“Anyone can craft killer beats with this superbly designed music maker.” – App Store Editor’s Notes

"Figure Music App Is Awesome, Easy to Use" – Wired

"Makes powerful electronic music-making technology accessible to all." – The Guardian

"Music-Making App Lets You Be The Artist" – NPR

TOP FEATURES:
• Sounding like a pro has never been this easy.
• Explore the world of music-making with no experience required.
• Create complete songs with drums, bass and lead melodies.
• Compose and experiment by sliding your finger across the play pad.
• Never play a bad note – Figure keeps you in key, and on the beat.
• Add cool and exciting effects to your songs with easy XY-automation.
• Tweak and manipulate your song on the fly.
• Share your original creations to iTunes® library.

NITTY GRITTY DETAILS:
• Play in different keys & modes—set once or change on the fly
• Transform chords into melody lines with arpeggiator
• Tighten or loosen up your beats with Swing
• Add club sound to your tracks with Pump
• Save, browse and load song files
• Set length of loop (1, 2, 4, 8 bars)
• Select Bass & Lead Synth sounds from Reason’s Thor synthesizer
• Huge Drum sounds powered by Reason’s Kong drum machine
• Stream live audio directly to other Audiobus-compatible apps—see http://audiob.us for more information
• Background audio (in device Settings)

** Requirements: iOS 11 or higher.

raw_data.releaseNotes: · Minor bug fixes and improvements

apps.title: Harmoni Music-Sharing
apps.description:
See what your friends are listening to! Harmoni is a music sharing app that uses Apple Music to share and discover music. 

* Search and share music by posting songs, or making them your 'Song of the Day!'

* Keep the Streak Alive! Every new day you can choose a new 'Song of the Day' to increment your streak. Watch it grow and compete with your friends to see who can keep their streak the longest!

* Add to 'Library!' Save songs for later by adding them to your 'Library' inside the Harmoni Music-Sharing app!

* Harmoni can suggest songs for you too, wether that be songs recommended by Apple Music, or the current Top Charts.

* Link with Apple Music! Either save an individual song to Apple Music, or have the option to save all of your 'Songs of the Day' to a unique playlist (on Apply Music) so you can enjoy them later! All with the press of a button!

* Personalize your page by adding a profile image and creating a bio!

* Notifications that keep you in the loop. Stay connected by seeing who has liked your 'Song of the Day' or of any new followers that have come your way. You can also enable the option to be reminded when to post your next 'Song of the Day' so you don't lose out on your streak.

* Customizable settings that let you create a personalized experience. Featuring a 'light' and 'dark' mode for the app. Along with many other settings so that you can truly get the most out of Harmoni Music-Sharing!

Grab some friends and start listening today! :)

raw_data.releaseNotes:
-Overall app performance boosts
-Minor bug fixes

Happy listening! Enjoy :)
